name: Balls Out - The Boardgame!
description:
Grab your family, friends and your controllers and get ready for some fun!

Balls Out is a digital boardgame with competitive minigames.

Roll your dice, move your ball, gather coins and compete in the minigames.

The player with the most coins at the end of the game wins!

A note from Jumbob:

I am a solo developer from Dunedin, New Zealand. I am a salesperson during the day and develop games in my spare time to support my wife and kids. We love playing games together as a family, which is why I have decided to make this game. If you have a spare dollar or two, please consider supporting me.    :)

This game is in development so expect to find bugs and updates regularly. Please let me know if you find a bug or have some cool ideas to add!

Created using Unreal Engine 5, Blender and GIMP.
